Description: Floor sherd (with turn of stem just preserved) of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; lustrous black slip inside and out; inscription incised on interior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 527)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1504)
